# Introduction


## Twitter

Twitter is an American microblogging and social networking service on which users post and interact with messages known as "tweets"

Registered users can post, like and retweet tweets, but unregistered users can only read them.


## Celebrities and Twitter

It is a easy way to talk to celebrities, politicians, influencers and experts on Twitter, as Twitter has a clever audience which makes the Twitter chats (or interactions) much more interesting and quotable.


In this project, we will dig through two celebrities' tweets to see if they have their own habits when using Twitter, such as specific words.
